department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Standing Offer - Rental of Heavy Equipment c/w Operator, 5 CDSB Gagetown, N.B.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the establishment of a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO). This Standing Offer is for the supply and maintenance of various heavy equipment with operators on a rental basis at 5 CDSB Gagetown and Training Area, New Brunswick.
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
===========================

**Tender Title and Description**
-------------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting bids for a Standing Offer to provide Heavy Equipment Rental Services with Operators at 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick. This Standing Offer will cover the rental and maintenance of various heavy equipment for approximately two years, from July 1, 2023 to March 31, 2025.

**Award Criteria**
------------------

The procurement process will follow a competitive, open-bidding method. The winning bid will be selected based on the lowest price submitted.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   **Contract Duration:** Approximately 2 years from July 1, 2023 to March 31, 2025.
*   **Location:** 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick, Canada.
*   **Scope of Work:** Providing and maintaining heavy equipment rental services with operators.

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

*   **Procurement Category:** CNST (Construction)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Language:** Bilingual (English and French)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** None
*   **Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick, Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Sonia Stockman
Sonia.Stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**RFP Document Link**
----------------------

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15847487?extsite=MTU4NDc0ODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: The RFP document contains the specifications, terms, and conditions of the tender. Bidders should carefully review this document to submit a compliant bid.

**Notice Expiry Date**
---------------------

The tender closing date for this Solicitation is April 18, 2023 at 14:00:00 hrs. Bids received after this date and time will not be considered.

Note that the notice expiry date indicates that the solicitation has expired and is no longer active. This notice restricts new tender responses. However, note that it could be a corresponding system error or update issue. 
Please contact the organization to verify if the solicitation is still active. 
If you have any feedback please let me know. 
The snippet will be modified according to your response. 

Note: The Government Tender Announcement has been re-written without extraneous information. The entry adheres to the format set
